Jekyll Themes

Shiori (based on Bootstrap)

Author: Elle Kasai
License: MIT License
Homepage Download Demo

Shiori is a Bootstrap-based Jekyll theme. It looks great by default, but you can customize it easily. It supports Bootstrap and Font Awesome classes out of the box.

Screenshots

Desktop/Tablet

Mobile

Color Schemes

I wear different colors (based on Flat UI Colors):

Turquoise

Green

Blue

Purple

Orange

Red

Want to Submit a Theme?

  • Fork the site on GitHub
  • Create a new post in the _posts directory and fill out the relevant YAML fields
  • Make a 250x200 thumbnail and drop it in the thumbnails directory. List its filename in the post's markdown file.
  • Test it out, then push your changes up and open a pull request.
